mapper.insert: insert into store_tb (t_vstng_cmpny, s_address, s_contact, s_biz_h) values (#{t_vstng_cmpny}, #{s_address}, #{s_contact}, #{s_biz_h})
mapper.select:
select t_vstng_cmpny, s_address, s_contact, s_biz_h from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(store_tb pk_store_tb) */ rownum rn, t_vstng_cmpny, s_address, s_contact, s_biz_h from store_tb where s_progress = '수거진행' and
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from store_tb where
s_progress = '수거진행'
